childMarkdownRemark.html:
Here you will find a compiled list of projects I have worked on as well as the technology stack that was used to build the website or application.

Some of the work may not be entirely on my own but as part of a team, collectively building the final outcome. Any projects that were part of a team will be indicated, likewise for projects I have individually completed.

Custom website built for a client. Design was created uniquely for them and built using GatsbyJS and DatoCMS content management system.

These were chosen to allow for a quick development time and to allow the client to manage the sites content and SEO settings easily using the DatoCMS dashboard interface.
